name: Chimera Ribbon
description:
Destroy enemy ribbons to scavenge their parts! However, splitting any ribbon creates a new enemy — including yourself.

WASD movement, mouse aiming, click to toggle fire.

Made for the GMTK 2021 game jam, with the theme of "Joined Together."

Sound effects from https://www.zapsplat.com/ and https://freesound.org/

"Summertime Sadness" from https://soundcloud.com/glitch, promoted by https://www.free-stock-music.com/
